sourcesContent:
<template>

   <v-card class="fixed-tabbar">
<v-container>
  <v-tabs class="fixed-tabs-bar" background-color="white" left dark>
    <v-tabs-slider color="black"></v-tabs-slider>
    <v-tab class="black--text text-h6 text-uppercase" @click="handleScroll('overview')">
      overview
    </v-tab>
    <v-tab class="black--text text-h6" @click="handleScroll('photo-gallery')">
      photo gallery
    </v-tab>
    <v-tab class="black--text text-h6" @click="handleScroll('nearby')">
      nearby
    </v-tab>
  </v-tabs>
</v-container>
</v-card>

</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'TabBar',
    methods: {
    handleScroll(id) {
      console.log("scroll", id)
      this.$vuetify.goTo("#" + id, { offset: 50 });
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style>
.fixed-tabbar {
  position: sticky;
  top: 60px;
  z-index: 2;
}
</style>
